channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Contact Form, Drag and Drop Form Builder for WordPress – Everest Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Contact Form, Drag and Drop Form Builder for WordPress – Everest Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-24907|2024-08-03T19:49:13.505Z -- unknown -- contact%20form%2C%20drag%20and%20drop%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20everest%20forms
item.description: The Contact Form, Drag and Drop Form Builder for WordPress plugin before 1.8.0 does not escape the status parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
